decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby approved shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted therewith (Design and Access Statement, N278/LE/1.0, N278/LE/2.0, N278/LE/3.0, N278/LE/4.0, N278/LE/8.0, received 28 May 2014 and N278/LE/5.0 (rev D), N278/LE/6.0 (rev C), N278/LE/7.0 (rev C), received 10 September 2014) and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby approved shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - No additional flank windows or other glazed openings shall be formed in the north-western facing wall of the roof extension hereby approved without the prior written consent of the Local Planning Authority.
Condition : 5 - Details of joinery shall be in accordance with the advice given in Technical Note 3 of the Bedford Park Society's handbook for residents and architects.
Condition : 6 - Details of brickwork shall be in accordance with the advice given in Technical Note 2 of the Bedford Park Society's handbook for residents and architects.
description: Erection of a single storey side and rear extensions with roof lantern window on rear extension of the house
